summary: This document is an email chain between FBI personnel discussing the coordination of victim briefings for the Epstein case in New York and Miami. It includes planning for tracking victim invitations, comparing victim lists between cases, and drafting invitation letters for victims to attend briefings in October 2019.

persons.name: N. (DO) (FBI)
persons.context: Coordinates victim lists and logistics for Epstein case briefings, provides spreadsheet comparing victims between NY and MM cases.

persons.name: L. (DO) (FBI)
persons.context: Requests tracking of victim briefing invitations and confirms briefing plans with ASAC, works on victim specialist support.

persons.name: (NY) (FBI)
persons.role: FBI New York Field Office personnel
persons.context: Requests victim list for invitation letters and collaborates on briefing logistics with the Victim Services Division.

persons.name: M, N. (NY) (FBI)
persons.role: FBI New York Field Office personnel
persons.context: Copied on emails regarding victim briefing coordination and victim list management.

persons.name: ASAC
persons.context: Requests weekly oversight of victim briefing invitations and confirms briefing plans.

persons.name: Flood, MI H. (DO) (FBI)
persons.context: Recipient of initial email confirming Epstein briefings.

persons.name: Sosa
persons.context: Previously reserved a conference room in Miami for the Epstein briefing.

connections.description: Collaborate on victim briefing logistics and victim list management for the Epstein case.
Coordinate on victim list verification and invitation processes for New York briefings.
ASAC directs L. to provide weekly oversight of victim briefing invitations.

events.title: Epstein Victim Briefing in Florida
events.description: Planned victim briefing at 2030 SW 145th Avenue, Miramar, FL 33027 at 10:00 AM for victims of the Epstein case.

events.title: Epstein Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: Planned victim briefing at 290 Broadway, New York, NY 10007 at 10:00 AM for victims of the Epstein case.

events.title: Coordination of Victim Briefings
events.description: FBI personnel exchange emails to finalize victim lists, tracking methods, and logistics for upcoming Epstein case victim briefings.

keyFacts: The FBI planned separate victim briefings for the Epstein case in Florida (October 15, 2019) and New York (October 23, 2019).
The New York case (31E-NY-3027571) had 39 victims, while the MM case (31E-MM-108062) had 35 victims, with efforts to consolidate lists.
FBI Victim Services Division personnel coordinated invitation tracking, victim list verification, and logistics for the briefings.
Victims were allowed to bring one support person to the briefings, which aimed to inform them of available services.
The email chain reveals internal FBI coordination between New York, Miami, and the Victim Services Division regarding victim outreach.
